attributes.action: Voice for Migrated Nurses on Career Progression.
attributes.background: Over 30,000 Nurses from India and other non-European countries working with NHS hospitals. They were recruited by Nhs to help on nurse shortage all over the country.Unfortunatly,we the hard working,skilled and knowledgeable nurses are silently suffering discrimination on career progression.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
